lead_paragraph: The defending champion Lorena Ochoa of Mexico shot a four-under-par 68 to take a two-stroke lead in the suspended second round of the Canadian Women’s Open in Ottawa. Ochoa, last year’s winner at Royal Mayfair in Edmonton, Alberta, is at 10-under 134.
